title: The Scream of the Arctic
marks:
component L2013.102.1i

on verso LR corner, blac
description:
a: green ground with red tiger stripe form diagonally from LL to UR
b: maroon ground with blue area in UL and pink \"Y\" shape horizontally across center
c: pink ground with green and tan area in UR
d: green ground with horizontal red, pink and maroon lines across center
e: green ground with red horizontal line running across and a white/red/blue form in the LR corner
f: olive green ground with blue form in the LL and a horizontal red \"Y\" shape across center
g: green ground with colorful form vertically through the center; two purple lines in UR corner
h: mottled green and yellow ground with white/red/blue form in UR
i: olive green ground with maroon in LR and white/red/blue form in UL
